body:
Interestingly, THC is stricter than it maybe needs to be (doesn't accept taking index dim < src dim:
```
>>> torch.zeros(3,4).cuda().scatter_(0,torch.cuda.LongTensor([[0,0,0,0],[1,1,1,1]]),torch.arange(1,9).resize_(3,4).cuda())
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
RuntimeError: Index tensor must have the same size as input tensor. at /data/users/gchanan/pytorch6/torch/lib/THC/generic/THCTensorScatterGather.cu:116
```
